|rad1chip2 = Intersil;ISL3684; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Gemtek WX-6215D / WX-6215 CPU is part S3C4510B01-QERO. Router WAN interface is 10Mbit, LAN (switched) is 10/100. The stock firmware is Linux-based. ==Links of Interest== [http://mail.linux.ie/pipermail/ilug/2003-March/055449.html Boot log]
[http://web.archive.org/web/20050404033454/http://trilug.org/~chrish/dell-1184/ Serial pinout, pictures, firmware source (via archive.org)]
